ruleEntry.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), Subject == 'TEST', ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), IF(Value( ABCD_PSGroupId__c ) == 8 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c ) == 50 , true , false), IF(Value( ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c ) > 500 && Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c ) < 1099,true,false) )

AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), Subject == 'TEST', IF(Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 1 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 2 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 3 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 5 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 6 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 9 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 11 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 14 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 17 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 19 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 21 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 22 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 25 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 45 , true , false) )

AND( ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), Subject == 'TEST', IF(Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 7 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 10 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 13 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 24 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 26 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 27 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 30 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 40 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 60 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 50 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) > 51 , true , false), IF(((Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c ) > 0 && Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c )<499) ||(Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c ) > 1300 && Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c )< 1799)),true,false ))

AND( ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), Subject == 'TEST', OR( ISPICKVAL( Asset.CC_Brand__c ,'Fiat'), IF((ABCD_Family__c == '4C' ||ABCD_Family__c == 'BA' || ABCD_Family__c == 'BF' || ABCD_Family__c == 'BG' ||ABCD_Family__c == 'BU'||ABCD_Family__c == 'B1' || ABCD_Family__c == 'BV' || ABCD_Family__c == 'BQ' ||ABCD_Family__c == 'FB' || ABCD_Family__c == 'GA' ||ABCD_Family__c == 'VF' || ABCD_Family__c == 'VM' || ABCD_Family__c == 'GU' || ABCD_Family__c == 'PD' || ABCD_Family__c == 'FD'),true,false) ) )

AND( ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), Subject == 'TEST', NOT ( OR ( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), RIGHT(Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, 6) == 'Level1', IF(Value( ABCD_PSGroupId__c ) == 8 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c ) == 50 , true , false), IF(Value( ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c ) > 500 && Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c ) < 1099,true,false) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), RIGHT(Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, 6) == 'Level1', IF(Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 1 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 2 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 3 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 5 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 6 || Status , 'Open'), RIGHT(Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, 6) == 'Level1', IF(Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 7 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 10 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 13 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 24 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 26 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 27 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 30 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 40 || Value(ABCD_PSGroupId__c) == 60 ) > 1300 && Value(ABCD_PSIllustrationId__c )< 1799)),true,false ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL(Type,'Specifying'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), RIGHT(Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, 6) == 'Level1', OR( ISPICKVAL( Asset.CC_Brand__c ,'Fiat'), IF((ABCD_Family__c == '4C' ||ABCD_Family__c == 'BA' || ABCD_Family__c == 'BF' || ABCD_Family__c == == 'VM' || ABCD_Family__c == 'GU' || ABCD_Family__c == 'PD' || ABCD_Family__c == 'FD'),true,false) ) ) ) ) )
AND( ISPICKVAL(CC_LOB__c , 'PS'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Open'), Subject == 'TEST', ISPICKVAL(Type , 'Performance/Accessories Technical'))
